sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Vim-&vim-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout:
sh from the bash package
ld from the binutils package as from the binutils package
cmp from the diffutils package diff from the diffutils package
chmod from the fileutils package cp from the fileutils package ln from the fileutils package mkdir from the fileutils package mv from the fileutils package rm from the fileutils package touch from the fileutils package
find from the find package
cc from the gcc package
grep from the grep package
make from the make package
hostname from the net-tools package
sed from the sed package
echo from the sh-utils package expr from the sh-utils package uname from the sh-utils package whoami from the sh-utils package
cat from the textutils package tr from the textutils package wc from the textutils package
